headline: Fragrance Creators Association Names Scott Rodrigue of Procter & Gamble to Board of Directors
summary: P&G's global fragrance innovation chief brings 35+ years of leadership; succeeds Joanna Clarke. WASHINGTON, DC / ACCESS Newswire / September 3, 2025 / Fragrance Creators Association (FCA) today announced the appointment of Scott Rodrigue, Chief R&D ...

headline: Rhodes Convenience Stores names new COO
summary: Robert Cisneros joins the Missouri-based c-store from Procter & Gamble, where he held a variety of operations and leadership roles for 29 years.
